Surrender

Grace in the margins, hope in the silence

God’s sovereignty in life’s interruptions

Join a journey of faith, creativity, and renewal

A space where God's presence meets life's detours

Discover devotionals that reflect His grace in unexpected places.

“Not my will, but Yours be done.” — Luke 22:42

In the margins of our plans, God writes His own story. Surrender isn’t weakness—it’s the birthplace of divine strength. When we release control, we make room for grace to flow freely.

Let this be your invitation to trust again.
